A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
With TRoS in\, we can see more clearly how TLJ really ruined the whole trilogy.

This movie destroys every lead from TFA\, ruins both the old characters as the new one\, and complicate things to an absurd level for Ep9\, which is miraculously somewhat saved at the last moment.

TLJ works ok as a standalone movie\, but not as the middle act of a trilogy\, let alone as part of the saga.
